headline: Ex-Trump officials pressure Texas Governor Greg Abbott to declare ‘invasion’ along Mexico border
author: Via AP news wire
sentences: Former Trump administration officials are pressing Texas Gov Greg Abbott to declare an “invasion” along the US-Mexico border and give thousands of state troopers and National Guard members sweeping new authority to turn back migrants, essentially bestowing enforcement powers that have been a federal responsibility.
